Question: Sound Fun Corporation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Sound Fun Corporation

Product 1

- Sonus faber Suprema speaker system
- Priced at $750,000
- 4/5-way system with 8 front-firing speakers and 2 back-firing drivers
- Matching elliptical subwoofers with powerful 15-inch transducers
- Dual mono and fully balanced electronic crossover
- Built with luxurious materials including carbon fiber, wood, solid aluminum, and Italian leather

Product 2

- FiiO R9 desktop streamer and headphone amp/DAC
- Supports wired and wireless headphones, active speakers, smartphones, and PCs
- Power output of up to 7300mW
- HDMI ARC port, SD and USB ports, optical, coaxial, and ethernet inputs
- 8-Channel ESS Sabre ES9038PRO DACs
- Full-HD 6-inch color touchscreen display
- Priced at $1,499

Product 3

- Klipsch Flexus series soundbars, subwoofers, and satellite speakers
- Flexus Core 100 ($299) and 200 ($499) soundbars
- Sub 100 subwoofer and Surr 100 surrounds
- Made in partnership with Onkyo
- Due out by April with further innovations in the future
Summary_cn:
声音好玩有限公司

产品1

- Sonus faber Suprema音箱系统
- 售价$750,000
- 4/5路系统，8个前置音箱和2个后置驱动器
- 配备15英寸强大的椭圆形低音驱动器的匹配型椭圆形低音箱
- 双单声道和全平衡电子分频器
- 使用豪华材料制成，包括碳纤维、木材、实心铝和意大利皮革

产品2

- FiiO R9台式串流播放器和耳机放大器/DAC
- 支持有线和无线耳机、有源音箱、智能手机和个人电脑
- 最大功率输出为7300mW
- HDMI ARC端口、SD卡和USB接口、光纤、同轴和以太网输入
- 8通道ESS Sabre ES9038PRO DAC
- 全高清6英寸彩色触摸屏显示屏
- 售价$1,499

产品3

- Klipsch Flexus系列声音栏、低音炮和卫星音箱
- Flexus Core 100（$299）和200（$499）声音栏
- Sub 100低音炮和Surr 100环绕音箱
- 与Onkyo合作制造
- 最迟于4月发布，并将在未来进行进一步创新
